customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This had lasted 6 months of almost daily use, by my special needs son. He chews on it, throws it, bangs it on the ground, turns it on and off and up and down constantly. If it can withstand that, I'm happy!! Before this one, we went through a speaker a month!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Corra

customer_reviews.title: Sound will blow your mind
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable sound. I don't know much about speakers, but my ears know what they like: full, round, rich, sound that makes you feel like you are in the middle of the band of orchestra. I bought two of these as gifts for Christmas and each recipient was thrilled with the sound. I decided to buy one for myself, but the price went up from the sale price of $49.95 to almost a hundred dollars. I'll just keep my eye on this product and hope for another sale! I can hardly wait.
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Hartvig-Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker for the price

Both units occasionally have trouble connecting to my phone. Not sure if it is my phone or not, but I don't usually have problems connecting to things via Bluetooth. This is the only reason for 4 stars, otherwise they work well, sound good, are definitely waterproof, and the batteries last all day.

customer_reviews.title: Love it, except for one thing...
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker, but, have one complaint. There are small plastic... pins, rivits that hold the rubber outer case on to the speaker. I keep the speaker in a bag that I carry for work and it gets put in and out often. This causes the pin rivit fasteners to break rather quickly. This makes the rubber case flap a but. This is the only issues I have with product, if they would change out those plastic bits Id give this all five stars.

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly durable! Will outlast the roaches in WW3

He called me today saying it got forgotten on the back of a coworker's work truck, and fell off at highway speeds to live on the blacktop. When he found it, it had obviously been run over (tire track marks) but guess what amazonian buyers? IT STILL PLAYS, WITH SOUND QUALITY!!!! Granted, sound quality has gone from excellent to good but OMG it survived 6 hours of life on the highway. Will absolutely, definayely be buying this product again as long as Lansing makes these beasts!!

customer_reviews.title: Mighty sound from a little box!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Altec Lansing IMW577-AB Lifejacket 2 Bluetooth Speaker specifically for our family beach vacation. We used this poolside, but didn't have it in the water. The sound carried well in the open space. The speaker was kept in the shade at the end of the pool and could easily be heard at a 50' distance. I was surprised how much we used it throughout the day. We played music while we were all cooking in the kitchen too. I'm very pleased with this purchase for on the go situations to set the mood for FUN!!!

customer_reviews.title: It worked great until the charger port quit charging.

The charge would last all day... 8 hours at least... listening at almost full volume. Good speaker... if it charged. It plugs in nice and tight.. so no, I didn't ream the plug and I have tried different chords.... something inside must have gave way. I would give it a 5 star if it didn't break.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Ricketts

customer_reviews.title: Mounting hardware does not fit the speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Altec Lansing LifeJacket 2 Bluetooth Speaker. The speaker comes with mounting hardware. The mount does not fit the speaker. That is because the mounting hardware is a standard 1/4 x 20 bolt that all speakers, cameras, etc., use. Unfortunately, the speaker has been equipped with a metric M8 x 1.0 threaded insert during the manufacturing process. This means the speaker is unmountable with the provided hardware, or any other common mounting options. The sound quality is good and the battery life is good. If those are the only things you are looking for in this speaker, you should be happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L Byers

customer_reviews.title: A speaker worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing speaker. The bass is deep but not overpowering. Very little distortion maxing out the volume. The speaker can be very loud if you want to. I can have the volume at 60% on my phone and have it comfortably wash out every sound in my environment. The bluetooth range is also exceptional, I can walk a good distance away from it and not have it cut out, though I've never walked further than 20yds away from it. The battery life is ridiculous, I use it about 6 hours a day every day. I used it for 3 days straight without a recharge and it was still good to go. I'd recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Short Life

Tried multiple charging cables/outlets but won't indicate taking a charge. Called Altec Lansing Support. They are sorry, but offered no assistance. I will not purchase an Altec Lansing product again.

It's great, water proof, being by a pool has fallen in and comes out like nothing. Give it a try, you won't be disappointed, the sound is amazing.
